remarks: Version of ~ rexlimd with deduction version of second hypothesis. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
statement:
rexlimd2.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
rexlimd2.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
rexlimd2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
rexlimd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps -> ch ) ) $.
